text: :world_map: Has anyone created dynamic CTAs based on a visitors IP location?  >> I know that HubSpot has Smart CTAs based on country - but I need to drill down further than that.  Any advice?

If related to a contact list >> I don't believe there is a Hubl tag/variable for it... But I do know you can get the size of the list with the HubSpot API:  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/lists/contact-lists-overview>.  See line 10

does anyone know if it is possible to customise the livechat workflow (to allow multiple message boxes) also if im able to add hyperlinks and shorten them to fewer words instead of having the whole of the url

Reminder to everyone, the community dev event is happening Tuesday.

We are OUT of in-person slots. *You can still attend virtually* however - There is a link to subscribe to the YouTube Channel that will be live-streaming the event <https://devday.splashthat.com/>
Hey, does anyone know an alternative to SabaiDirectory for me to use in HubSpot
Our users are not able to set thumbnails for .mov video files in the file manager, but they are with .mp4s
